children.value: Once you've installed Kerberos Open Source, you will have access to the web application. This web application allows you to administrate your the machinery.

The first time you open a browser, and navigate to the web application (ip address of your device), you will land on the welcome page. This page will guide you through some basic steps and set simple configurations such as username and password.

When you've finished the welcome page, you will be redirected to the login page from now one. Use the credentials you have defined during the configuration of the welcome page. By default the username is
